Hi, I'm pretty new to downloading 3D movies since I only just bought an 3D TV. The only 3D movie I've downloaded so far is Avatar and it worked great. But I have a question, what is the difference between "HSBS" and "Stereoscopic Side by Side". The Avatar movie I downloaded was "Stereoscopic Side by Side" and I just merged the two images together and switched L-R to R-L or something like that, it might have been the opposite. I've tried goggling HSBS 3D but didn't find anything useful.

I'm thankful for any information :)
